statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_readings;
SELECT id, sensor_id, reading_value, timestamp FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, sensor_id, reading_value, timestamp FROM sensor_readings WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT AVG(reading_value) AS average_value FROM sensor_readings;
SELECT MAX(reading_value) AS max_value, MIN(reading_value) AS min_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, sensor_id, reading_value, timestamp FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_value > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_value BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY sensor_id, timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, sensor_id, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_reading FROM sensor_readings GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING avg_reading > 7
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_value < 5 OR timestamp <= '2022-06-30 23:59:59' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT machine_id, reading_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE machine_id = 2 ORDER BY reading_value ASC
SELECT MAX(reading_value) AS max_reading FROM sensor_readings WHERE machine_id = 3
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS reading_count FROM sensor_readings GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY reading_count DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, machine_id, reading_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE machine_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT timestamp, reading_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE machine_id = 2 ORDER BY reading_value DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(reading_value) AS max_reading FROM sensor_readings GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT AVG(reading_value) AS avg_reading, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM sensor_readings
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT machine_id, location FROM machinery WHERE location LIKE '%factory%'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, location FROM machinery
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT machine_name, location FROM machinery WHERE machine_id = 3
SELECT sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 2 ORDER BY sensor_type
SELECT reading_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE machine_id = 2 AND reading_value > 50
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings JOIN machinery ON sensor_readings.machine_id = machinery.machine_id
SELECT * FROM sensor_reading;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_value FROM sensor_reading WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT machinery_name, location, status FROM machinery ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT log_id, machinery_id, maintenance_description, timestamp FROM maintenance_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS num_alerts FROM alerts GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING num_alerts > 3;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_value, timestamp FROM sensor_reading WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT machinery_name, location, status FROM machinery WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT alert_id, sensor_id, alert_message, timestamp FROM alerts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT machinery_id, machinery_name, location, status FROM machinery WHERE location LIKE '%Warehouse%' ORDER BY machinery_name ASC;
SELECT log_id, machinery_id, maintenance_description, timestamp FROM maintenance_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SensorReadings LIMIT 10;
SELECT machine_id, sensor_type, reading_value FROM SensorReadings WHERE machine_id = 1 ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, sensor_type, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_reading FROM SensorReadings GROUP BY machine_id;
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, location FROM Machinery WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT machine_id, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM Alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM SensorReadings WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT machine_name, location FROM Machinery WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT machine_id, alert_message FROM Alerts WHERE alert_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_reading_value FROM SensorReadings GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING AVG(reading_value) > 50
SELECT machine_id, log_notes FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
